Test Name: IDH1, IDH2, and TERT Mutation Analysis (Next-Generation Sequencing)
Specimen Type: Fresh or formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tumor tissue
Purpose: To detect mutations in the IDH1, IDH2, and TERT genes from tumor samples to aid in diagnosis and treatment planning.
Container: FFPE tissue block/slide or fresh tissue in a sterile container
Equipment: NGS platform (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), PCR thermal cycler, DNA extraction system, library preparation kit, sequencing analysis software
